textTemplates.name: tpl_IndustryGroup
textTemplates.text: Select attributes_industry_group_description__c, count(parent_id_formula__c) from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where parent_id_formula__c = '{!Economy_Sector.selectedChoiceValues}' group by attributes_industry_group_description__c

textTemplates.name: tpl_IndustryType
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, name__c from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where attributes_industry_group_description__c = '{!funcS_GetIndustryGroup}'
